extendedInfo.description: GaddafiGame is a political joke game. Itâs a sort of TicTacTouch game with slightly more complicated rules. You manipulate with 5 different portraits of the popular politicians. If youâre able to place 3 or more portraits of the politicians in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row then the portraits disappear and you get 10 points for each disappeared portrait. After each playerâs step, computer places 1-5 different politiciansâ portraits somewhere in the grid. The goal of the game is to get the highest score.

reviews.comment: Very funny, especially naked wife of Sarkozi and Putin\'s fist
